name: Tadpoles (Ratima Chandrema)
description:
"Tadpoles" is  fun short game which you will experience the life cycle of a frog and probably help them to survive. 

Control

  • Fixed Resolution 1000*1000 
  • The highlighted frog will follow your mouse
  • Click on the frog to highlight it

Game Jam

This game has been submitted to GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the Theme "Out of Control". 

This was also my first ever Jam and my first ever game that made with in 48 hours. 

Thank you for checking out my game! Enjoy! 

ps. if there is any issue, please let me know in the comment
